events.message: I ordered a jacket last week, but it doesn't fit and I want to return it for a full refund as soon as possible.
The system identified this case as a Refund request based on the customer's mention of return and refund.
A customer support agent has been assigned to handle the refund inquiry for the returned jacket.
Hello! Thanks for reaching out to us about your jacket return. I'm here to help you with your refund process.
Could you please provide your order number and confirm if the jacket is unused and with original tags for the return?
Sure, my order number is 789456123. The jacket is brand new, never worn, and I still have the tags attached.
Thank you for the info! You can ship the jacket back using our prepaid return label. Once we receive it, we'll process your full refund within 5 business days.
Great, thank you for the clear instructions. I appreciate your prompt help with this refund.
We have received your returned jacket and processed your refund. You should see the amount credited to your account shortly.
Just checking in to ensure that you received your refund and if you need any further assistance from us.
Since your refund has been completed and you've confirmed satisfaction, we are closing this case now. Thank you for contacting support!
